name: detaching
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
detach
to separate or remove something from something else that it is connected to: You can detach the hood if you prefer the coat without it. Detach the lower part of the form from this letter and return it to the above address. Compare
attach (CONNECT)
